TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RangeValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator

summary.span: 检查输入控件的值是否在值的指定范围内。

span.span: Checks whether the value of an input control is within a specified range of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制测试是否为指定范围内的输入控件的值。The control tests whether the value of an input control is within a specified range. 控件使用四个关键属性来执行其验证。The control uses four key properties to perform its validation. 属性包含要验证的输入的控件。The property contains the input control to validate. 和属性指定的有效范围的最小值和最大值。The and properties specify the minimum and maximum values of the valid range. 属性用于指定要比较的值的数据类型。The property is used to specify the data type of the values to compare. 要比较的值被转换为此数据类型，然后执行验证操作。The values to compare are converted to this data type before the validation operation is performed. > [!NOTE] > 当属性设置为和当前的日历类型为非公历时，验证程序执行仅服务器端验证。When the property is set to and the current calendar type is non-Gregorian, the validator performs server-side validation only. 验证程序客户端脚本支持仅公历日历。The validator client script supports only Gregorian calendars. 下表列出了可以进行比较的不同数据类型。The following table lists the different data types that can be compared. |数据类型Data Type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`String`|字符串数据类型。A string data type.| |`Integer`|32 位有符号整数数据类型。A 32-bit signed integer data type.| |`Double`|一个双精度浮点数字数据类型。A double-precision floating point number data type.| |`Date`|日期数据类型。A date data type.| |`Currency`|Decimal 数据类型，可以包含货币符号。A decimal data type that can contain currency symbols.| > [!NOTE] > 验证成功的输入的控件是否为空。Validation succeeds if the input control is empty. 使用控制，以使输入的控件的必填字段。Use a control to make the input control a mandatory field. > [!NOTE] > 控件将引发异常，如果指定值或不能将属性转换为指定。The control throws an exception if the value specified by the or property cannot be converted to the specified . > [!NOTE] > 当你使用控件内部控制，请确保验证程序控件与之关联的控件相同的面板。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关使用详细信息控制部分页面更新，请参阅[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 验证控件的其他信息，请参阅。For additional information on validation controls, see . ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以便它将生成符合辅助功能标准标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建控件在网页上，以确定输入控件中输入的值是否在比较范围内。The following example demonstrates how to create a control on the Web page to determine whether the value entered into an input control is within the comparison range. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 将需要呈现的控件的 HTML 特性和样式添加到指定的 对象中。

span.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles for the control that need to be rendered to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写中的自定义服务器控件的方法，以便文本始终显示为粗体。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the text always displays as bold. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_rangevalidator_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_rangevalidator_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_rangevalidator_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_rangevalidator_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义服务器控件，以便它始终会进行验证的值存在并且在最多和最小值为指定。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always validates that the value exists and is within the maximum and minimum values specified for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_rangevalidator_evaluateisvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_rangevalidator_evaluateisvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_rangevalidator_evaluateisvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_rangevalidator_evaluateisvalid.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MaximumValue { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MaximumValue : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置验证范围的最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum value of the validation range.
The maximum value of the validation range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定验证范围的最大值。Use the property to specify the maximum value of the validation range. 如果指定此属性的值无法转换为指定的数据类型属性，将引发异常。If the value specified by this property fails to convert to the data type specified by the property, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定`ValidationDataType.Date`有关而无需以编程方式设置应用程序的区域性属性，您应为使用非特定区域性格式，例如 YYYY/MM/DD和属性。If you specify `ValidationDataType.Date` for the property without programmatically setting the culture for the application, you should use a culture-neutral format, such as YYYY/MM/DD, for the and properties. 否则，可能无法正确解释日期。Otherwise, the date may not be interpreted correctly. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定验证范围的最大值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the maximum value of the validation range. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[RangeValidator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RangeValidator/CS/rangevalidatorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RangeValidator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RangeValidator/VB/rangevalidatorvb.aspx#1)]

member this.MinimumValue : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置验证范围的最小值。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum value of the validation range.
The minimum value of the validation range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定验证范围的最小值。Use the property to specify the minimum value of the validation range. 如果指定此属性的值无法转换为指定的数据类型属性，将引发异常。If the value specified by this property fails to convert to the data type specified by the property, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定`ValidationDataType.Date`有关而无需以编程方式设置应用程序的区域性属性，您应为使用非特定区域性格式，例如 YYYY/MM/DD和属性。If you specify `ValidationDataType.Date` for the property without programmatically setting the culture for the application, you should use a culture-neutral format, such as YYYY/MM/DD, for the and properties. 否则，可能无法正确解释日期。Otherwise, the date may not be interpreted correctly. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定验证范围的最小值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the minimum value of the validation range. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
